official.headline: Orderly Reforms Promised
official.anchor_line: Congress leaders pledge timely reforms and encourage public confidence during upcoming town forums.
official.contextual_reframing: Adjustments ensure service continuity and promote trust in systematic progress.

official.headline: Public Voices Heard
official.anchor_line: Large crowds gather peacefully at Congress institutions following calls for increased transparency in city governance.
official.contextual_reframing: Open debate strengthens our collective commitment to resilience and responsive adaptation.

official.headline: Transparency Ensured Now
official.anchor_line: Full disclosure of past access measures prompts citywide review of participatory rights and future practices.
official.contextual_reframing: Acknowledgment of challenges drives forward greater clarity and modernization for all citizens.

underground.headline: Evidence Buried
underground.anchor_line: Congress scrambles to hide proof of exclusion — public gets empty promises and brave faces.
underground.contextual_reframing: Backroom deals and coded messages show how power stays one step ahead of truth. Nothing changes until we force it.

underground.headline: Outrage Erupts Again
underground.anchor_line: Oksana’s leaks light the spark. The people gather. The city shakes. Congress stalls with apologies.
underground.contextual_reframing: When leaders repeat old abuses and call them 'mistakes,' only public rage brings change. Their reforms are just words until we see records burned.

underground.headline: Full Reckoning Exposed
underground.anchor_line: Exclusion isn’t gone — it’s renamed. Ghost lists. Quiet bans. Stenograd rises as the truth finally rips off the mask.
underground.contextual_reframing: No more hiding. The surveillance game is out in the open. Now it’s our turn to decide what kind of city we want back.
